snippet: LEAD: HIRAM JOHNSON, leader of the California Progressive movement of the early 1900's, would probably agree that democracy has gotten a little out of hand this year. But he might argue that the crowded state ballot hardly reflects the direct demo...
lead_paragraph: LEAD: HIRAM JOHNSON, leader of the California Progressive movement of the early 1900's, would probably agree that democracy has gotten a little out of hand this year. But he might argue that the crowded state ballot hardly reflects the direct democracy he espoused.

headline.main: CALIFORNIA HAS 29 ON THE BALLOT: WITH PROLIFERATION OF BALLOT INITIATIVES, SUDDENLY EVERYONE'S INTEREST IS SPECIAL
